ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt: ï»¿OFROAL ' DOCUMENTS OP RECOMMENDATION OF THE STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the nominee selected by Republic of Tajikistan as a member of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit and Grant for the Additional Financing of the Second Public Employment for Sustainable Agriculture and Water Resources Management Project to the Republic of Tajikistan The undersigned member of the Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits this recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association provide to the Republic of Tajikistan a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 4,700,000 and an additional grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 3,900,000. The purpose of said credit and grant is to provide additional funds to supplement the financial assistance furnished by the Association under the Financing Agreement (Second Public Employment for Sustainable Agriculture and Water Resources Management Project), dated February 5, 2013, between the Republic of Tajikistan and the Association. 1. The member of the Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit and additional grant, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit and additional grant are to be applied. 2. The member of the Committee is of the opinion that the project in support of which the proceeds of such credit and additional grant are to be applied continues to come within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Tajikistan and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Tajikistan. 3. Accordingly, the member of the Committee finds that said project continues to merit financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such additional assistance. Nominee selected by GoverKfor the Republic of Tajikistan Dated at Washington, D.C.
